original_request.template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
original_request.filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a wind-turbine farm that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

messages.content: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a wind-turbine farm that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Analyze live turbine data, adjust parameters within safety constraints, monitor the results, and report performance improvements.
message.reasoning:
The user wants a single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a wind-turbine farm. It needs to include:
 1. Analyzing live data
 2. Adjusting parameters within safety constraints
 3. Monitoring results
 4. Reporting performance improvements
 
 Constraints:
 - Single sentence
 - Plain English
 - Under 40 words
 - Output only the prompt text
 
 Let me draft this:
 
 Draft 1: Analyze live wind turbine data, adjust operational parameters within safety limits, monitor the results, and report any performance improvements to optimize the farm's output. (19 words) - Good, covers all points.
 
 Draft 2: Continuously analyze live turbine data to adjust control parameters within safety constraints while monitoring results and reporting performance improvements. (17 words)
 
 Draft 3: Analyze real-time wind farm data to optimize turbine parameters within safety limits, monitor performance changes, and document efficiency gains. (17 words)
 
 Draft 4: Review live turbine data to adjust settings within safety boundaries, track operational results, and report achieved performance improvements. (16 words)
 
 Draft 5: Examine live wind turbine data to optimize parameters within safety constraints, monitor outcomes, and report efficiency improvements. (15 words)
 
 All seem to fit. Let me check word count carefully:
 
 Draft 5 breakdown:
 Examine (1) live (2) wind (3) turbine (4) data (5) to (6) optimize (7) parameters (8) within (9) safety (10) constraints, (11) monitor (12) outcomes, (13) and (14) report (15) efficiency (16) improvements. (17) 
 
 That's 17 words. Well under 40.
 
 Actually, let me make sure I hit all four required elements clearly:
 1. Analyzing live data - "Examine live wind turbine data" ✓
 2. Adjusting parameters within safety constraints - "optimize parameters within safety constraints" ✓
 3. Monitoring results - "monitor outcomes" ✓
 4. Reporting performance improvements - "report efficiency improvements" ✓
 
 This works. But "outcomes" might be slightly less specific than "results." Let me adjust:
 
 Draft 6: Examine live turbine data to adjust parameters within safety constraints, monitor operational results, and report performance improvements. (16 words)
 
 Elements:
 1. Examine live turbine data ✓
 2. adjust parameters within safety constraints ✓
 3. monitor operational results ✓
 4. report performance improvements ✓
 
 That's clean and under 40 words.
 
 Another option:
 Draft 7: Analyze real-time wind farm data to optimize turbine settings within safety limits, track results, and document performance gains. (16 words)
 
 Actually, "optimize turbine settings" implies adjusting, but maybe being explicit is better.
 
 Draft 8: Analyze live turbine data, adjust parameters within safety constraints, monitor the results, and report performance improvements. (14 words)
 
 This is simple, clear, and covers all four elements explicitly.
 
 Word count check:
 Analyze (1) live (2) turbine (3) data, (4) adjust (5) parameters (6) within (7) safety (8) constraints, (9) monitor (10) the (11) results, (12) and (13) report (14) performance (15) improvements. (16)
 
 Perfect. This is plain English, single sentence, includes all required elements, and is well under 40 words.
 
 Wait, I should double-check that "adjust parameters" clearly implies "adjusting parameters within safety constraints" - yes, "within safety constraints" is explicit in the text.
 
 Final check:
 - Single sentence? Yes.
 - Plain English? Yes.
 - Includes analyzing live data? Yes ("Analyze live turbine data").
 - Includes adjusting parameters within safety constraints? Yes ("adjust parameters within safety constraints").
 - Includes monitoring results? Yes ("monitor the results").
 - Includes reporting performance improvements? Yes ("report performance improvements").
 - Under 40 words? Yes, 16 words.
 
 This looks good.
